channel.title: CVE Feed for Sophos -- Intercept X for Mobile (Android)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sophos -- Intercept X for Mobile (Android)

item.title: CVE-2021-25266|2024-08-03T19:56:11.058Z -- sophos -- intercept%20x%20for%20mobile%20%28android%29
item.description: An insecure data storage vulnerability allows a physical attacker with root privileges to retrieve TOTP secret keys from unlocked phones in Sophos Authenticator for Android version 3.4 and older, and Intercept X for Mobile (Android) before version 9.7.3495.
